concise_definition: n. 臀部, 屁股; v. 用臀部顶撞; n. 香烟头; n. 末端, 尾端

definitions.explanation_en: The buttocks; the rear part of the human body, often used in informal or vulgar contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指人体的臀部，常用于非正式或粗俗语境中。
definitions.example_en: He fell on his butt when he slipped on the ice.
definitions.example_cn: 他在冰上滑倒时摔了个屁股蹲儿。

definitions.explanation_en: To strike or push someone or something with the buttocks, often in a forceful or aggressive manner.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指用臀部猛烈撞击或顶撞某人或某物，常带有攻击性。
definitions.example_en: The bull butted the rancher with its horns.
definitions.example_cn: 那头公牛用角顶撞了牧场主。

definitions.explanation_en: The end or stub of a cigarette, especially after it has been smoked.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指香烟吸完后剩下的烟蒂。
definitions.example_en: She crushed the butt under her shoe and walked away.
definitions.example_cn: 她把烟头踩灭后走开了。

definitions.explanation_en: The end or rear part of something, especially a long object such as a rifle, a queue, or a road.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指某物的末端或尾部，尤指长形物体如步枪、队列或道路的末端。
definitions.example_en: The last person in line was at the butt of the queue.
definitions.example_cn: 队列最后一个人站在队尾。

comparison.analysis: “Bottom” (底部/臀部) 是更中性、通用的词，可用于身体部位、物体底部或抽象概念（如“the bottom of the page”）。而 “butt” 更口语化、粗俗，专指人体臀部，语气更随意甚至带有贬义。
“Rear” (后部) 是正式用语，常用于描述车辆、建筑或动物的后部，如 “rear window” 或 “rear end”。它不用于指人臀部，而 “butt” 在非正式语境中可特指人臀部，语义更具体且俚语化。
“End” (末端) 是最通用的词，可指时间、空间或抽象事物的终点，如 “the end of the movie”。而 “butt” 作为末端时，仅用于具体物体（如香烟、枪管），且带有粗俗或俚语色彩，语义范围更窄。
